name: Add new PomoDoneApp time entries to a Google Sheets Spreadsheet as a new row
description: Every time your PomoDoneApp timer stops, Make will automatically add the time entry to a selected Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1XsLT8pQEUSb4MVTyepiMpjBo9PcJNvesKxiAE6LIt2A/edit?usp=sharing).
